snippet.title: Saint Laurent's Hedi Slimane - The Fashion World's Latest Bad Boy
snippet.description: Saint Laurent's Fall Winter 2013 collection designed by Hedi Slimane During Paris’s fashion collections, Saint Laurent’s Hedi Slimane hit a bull’s eye for causing conflict, shock and being the most talked about designer of the season. True, apart from the International Herald Tribune’s critic Suzy Menkes who hailed and appreciated his [...] read »

snippet.title: NYFW Fall '13 Day 3: Lacoste, Prabal Gurung, Alexander Wang, Chloe Sevigny for Opening Ceremony

snippet.title: Wearing Retro To Work: Not Just For Your Grandmother
snippet.description: Do you think graphic prints and mauve should stay in your grandmother's closet? Think again! We'll show you how to be professional wearing mauve and graphic prints. Yes, we said professional. read »

snippet.title: E's Fashion Police Star Explains Why We Love Worst Dressed Lists
snippet.description: Best and Worst Dressed Lists are an industry all their own. Splashed them as headlines on magazine covers and the newsstand sales go through the roof. The great Joan Rivers even ignited a second coming out of such lists with E’s Fashion Police. George Kotsiopoulos has the pleasure of being in [...]

snippet.title: Proof That Fashion Is A World of Fabulous Contradictions
snippet.description: For the uninitiated, fashion can seem like a world of oxymorons, misplaced ironies and mixed metaphors, especially when you hear the cognoscenti talk about trends, inspirations and cultural references. If you didn’t know any better, you might find yourself scratching your head by the seemingly contradictory ways fashion insiders dissect [...]
